item.title: Abandoned Nitrous Oxide Canisters, 22nd November
item.description:
Would like to report two nitrous oxide (Fast Gas) canisters that have been dumped in the U-turn area on private land adjacent to the public road. The canisters appear to still contain gas, which could pose a safety risk to passersby. Please arrange for their safe collection and disposal.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Havisham Place, Upper Norwood, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Subsidence problem with the carriageway, 22nd November
item.description:

item.title: Various pavement defects dangerous to walk over/around, 22nd November
item.description:
The whole of the pavement area from under the railway walkway up to the turning towards Marlowe House on the public footpath There are numerous lifted and sunken paving slabs. A lady tripped and fell recently and had to attend A&E This is a serious defective area of approx 10m x 25m (could be larger, this is my estimate)
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Station Road, Longlands, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
